steps.text:
Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 3-2013. A 72-year-old 
woman with abdominal pain and distention after peritoneal dialysis.
Steele DJ(1), Kasmar AG, Guimaraes AR, Dekker JP.

Author information:
(1)Division of Nephrology, Department of Medicine, Massachusetts General 
Hospital, Boston, USA.
